attributes.action: tax towing caravans  according to size . £500 TO £1000 per year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Towing caravans currently use the roads free of charge.
This is totally unfair because many of them take up more of the road than an average sized car. Cars are taxed according to engine size and other green issues. Towing caravans should be taxed according to length starting at £500 per year for the smallest up to £1,000 per year for the longest.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
